tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE stem_educators (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name TEXT,
  last_name TEXT,
  email TEXT,
  institution TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Educators (
  educator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  institution VARCHAR(255),
  field_of_expertise VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Researchers (
  researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  institution VARCHAR(255),
  research_focus VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Collaboration (
  collaboration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id INT,
  educator_id INT,
  researcher_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES Projects(project_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (educator_id) REFERENCES Educators(educator_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES Researchers(researcher_id)
);

CREATE TABLE courses (
    course_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    course_name VARCHAR(50),
    course_description TEXT,
    educator_id INT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_educator FOREIGN KEY (educator_id) REFERENCES educators(educator_id)
);

CREATE TABLE collaborations (
    collaboration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    course_id INT,
    paper_id INT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_course FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES courses(course_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_paper FOREIGN KEY (paper_id) REFERENCES research_papers(paper_id)
);
